name: Mysore Palace
desc: A historical palace located in the city of Mysore, known for its royal heritage and architecture.

name: Lalbagh Botanical Garden
desc: A lush botanical garden in Bangalore, home to diverse flora and a majestic glasshouse.

name: Hampi
desc: A UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring ancient ruins and temples from the Vijayanagara Empire.

name: Gokarna
desc: A peaceful coastal town famous for its beaches and Mahabaleshwar Temple.

name: Murudeshwara
desc: A coastal town best known for the towering Shiva statue and beachside temple.

name: Dandeli
desc: Adventure hotspot offering white water rafting, jungle safaris, and rich biodiversity.

name: Shravanabelagola
desc: A Jain pilgrimage site featuring a colossal statue of Lord Bahubali.

name: Chikmagalur
desc: Hill station famous for coffee plantations, lush green hills, and pleasant climate.

name: ISKCON Temple Bangalore
desc: A modern and spiritual temple dedicated to Lord Krishna with cultural activities.

name: Jog Falls
desc: One of the highest plunge waterfalls in India, located in the Shimoga district.
